reviewText: Paramaguru (Ajit) lives with his sister (Anu Hassan) in Thenkasi of Tirunelveli district. He succeeds in getting selected for IPS and moves to Chennai to live with his father (Raghuvaran) at Anjeneya colony. Guru is intoleratent to injustice. Guru's father knowing this nature of his son, makes him promise to never lose his cool under any circumstances.
